mapper.select: SELECT STARTUP_ID, STARTUPNAME, ESTABLISHED_YEAR, SIZES, CATEGORYS,BUSINESS,NO_OF_EMPLOYEES,CITY ,ITEMS,NAMES,REGDATE FROM START_UP WHERE STARTUP_ID = #{startupId}
SELECT STARTUP_ID, STARTUPNAME, ESTABLISHED_YEAR, SIZES, CATEGORYS,BUSINESS,NO_OF_EMPLOYEES,CITY ,ITEMS,NAMES,REGDATE FROM START_UP WHERE STARTUP_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY STARTUP_ID DESC

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, STARTUPNAME, NAMES, STARTUP_ID, ESTABLISHED_YEAR, SIZES, CATEGORYS,BUSINESS,NO_OF_EMPLOYEES,CITY ,ITEMS,REGDATE FROM(SELECT * FROM START_UP WHERE STARTUP_ID IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY STARTUP_ID DESC)) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <=#{pageEnd}) ORDER BY STARTUP_ID DESC, REGDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM START_UP WHERE STARTUP_ID IS NOT NULL
